5 Element Barrier Array.flavour: using the 5 elements to block all. this barrier uses the harmony between 5 elements to block all that attempts to break through
5 Element Barrier Array.description: a simple barrier array that can block people from entering.

canRun.description: Determines if the barrier can run.

barrierRadius.description: Determines the radius of the barrier

barrierHealth.description: Outputs the barriers health nas a percentage

Heavenly Detection Array.description: detects entities in a certain radius

detectionRadius.description: determines the detection radius of the array

nearbyEntities.description: Outputs a list of all entities in its radius

Heavens Constant.flavour: holds the heavens laws in perpetuity

Heavenly Scrying Formation.flavour: strip back the heavens lore and peer into the truth
Heavenly Scrying Formation.description: checks if the input is in the provided

listInput.description: takes in the list for comparison

evaluate.description: true if it is in the list, false otherwise

Heavens Scales of Balance.flavour: uses the heavens scales to compare and balance
